changeSet.createView: SELECT ap.id,ap.purpose_of_sample,0 as level_no, (case when ap.start_time is not null then (TO_CHAR(ap.start_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')||'è‡³'||TO_CHAR(ap.end_time,'yyyy-MM-dd')) else null end ) as apply_time,ap.apply_person_name,ap.apply_code,ap.status, (select d.delegate_name from delegate d where d.id = ap.delegate_id) as delegate_name, (select LISTAGG(TO_CHAR(sample),',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY sample) from (select distinct s.sample_type_name as sample from stock_out_requirement req left join sample_type s on req.sample_type_id=s.id where req.stock_out_apply_id=ap.id ) )as sample_types, (select sum(req.count_of_sample) from stock_out_requirement req where req.stock_out_apply_id=ap.id) as count_of_sample, ap.count_of_stock_sample FROM stock_out_apply ap WHERE ap.parent_apply_id is null
